sentences.en: It can be difficult to ascertain the facts.
sentences.cn: 可能难以查明事实真相。

sentences.en: Through doing this, the teacher will be able to ascertain the extent to which the child understands what he is reading.
sentences.cn: 通过这样做，老师将能确定这个孩子对他正在读的内容的理解程度。

sentences.en: Cricket keeps an off-field umpire for boundary calls, and to ascertain whether batsmen are run out and if catches are real.
sentences.cn: 板球有一个场外的裁判来判定边界，并确定击球手是否出局，接球是否真实。
